duties_responsibilities.duty: Facilitate, communicate, and collaborate with the healthcare team and the patient/family to identify and meet the physical, emotional, and spiritual needs of the patient.
Promote the optimal health, well-being, and safety of the patient through use of the nursing process and in accordance with patient care standards, guidelines, and the State Nurse Practice Act.
Demonstrate personal accountability for relationship-based care, organizational mission, and core values.

education_certification.credential: RN License to practice in Colorado or Kansas as applicable
Basic Life Support (BLS) from the American Heart Association certification
ACLS from the American Heart Association certification (within six months of hire or transfer)
PALS from the American Heart Association or ENPC (within six months of hire or transfer)
NIHSS (within six months of hire or transfer)
TNCC or TCAR (within six months of hire or transfer)
Specialty Nursing Certification (CCRN or PCCN) preferred
